projects.title: Job Application Data Visualization
details: Deployed an interactive Streamlit application to analyze over 200 job applications, visualize industry trends, and calculate return-on-effort during a period of unemployment.
Calculated a 'return on effort' metric to optimize application effectiveness and showcase analysis skills.

projects.title: Network Analysis Project
details: Created a behavioral network from event data for NYUâ€™s Entrepreneurial Institute.
Used data visualization to highlight engagement patterns.

projects.title: Movie Review Sentiment Analysis
details: Performed logistic regression on 50,000 IMDb reviews.
Used Scikit-Learn, NLTK, and Jupyter for ML analysis.

projects.title: Daily Tarot Bot
details: Built a Twitter bot to post daily Tarot readings.
